result:
Found a bug in `pyatlan.pkg.utils.validate_multiselect`! ✅

The function crashes when given JSON strings containing nested lists (like `[["item1"]]`), throwing a ValidationError because it strictly expects flat lists of strings. This is problematic since nested arrays are valid JSON that could come from UI components.

Bug report saved to: `bug_report_pyatlan_pkg_utils_2025-08-18_21-43_7xq2.md`

tool_input.command: source /root/hypothesis-llm/envs/pyatlan_env/bin/activate && python -c "import pyatlan.pkg; print('success - treating as module')"
tool_input.description: Check if pyatlan.pkg is in the virtual environment
